page.title: 05Grayshott Health Farm
page.content: { Grayshott Health Farm}is half way between{Grayshott}and{Headley {Down.}People come from all over the world including{famous people}like {Mungo Jerry, Alvin Stardust}and{Jimmy {Saville. The Health farm have many facilities to help you{cut down weight.}They have facilities like{bikes, weights}and{gym {machines.}They also{massage}you and manicure your nails and give you saunas. They have an{indoor swimming pool for the people to swim in. They have chalets with a bathroom, bed and telephone so they can phone up to tell the reception if they want to have a sauna or massage. There is a big room where they go to eat{healthy {foods.}They are{not allowed to smoke and are only allowed out in the evening for a certain amount of time.
